findings.title: Adherence to Best Practices
findings.description: The audit report highlights several best practices that are not followed in the code, including exceeding maximum line length, reusing similar names for different variables or structures, and using magic numbers without declaration.

findings.title: QSP-3 Privileged Roles and Ownership
findings.description: Certain contracts have special roles, which provide certain addresses with privileged roles. Such roles may pose a risk to end-users.
